price: Vuga uti “Ubuvugizi bwose ni ubwa Allah. Ni We nyir’ubwami bw’ibirere n’isi. Kandi iwe ni ho muzagarurwa.”
arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ جَمِيعٗاۖ لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul lillahi al-shafāʿatu jamīʿan lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
